body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

<!-- Fill in the exact spec you are trying to build and the relevant part of the error message -->
```console
$ spack install fast-global-file-status

==> 28487: Installing fast-global-file-status
==> Using cached archive: /home/ubuntu/spack/var/spack/cache/_source-cache/archive/e6/e6fba4a0b7f055899fa0e05d93a435c7f1f2ec1158b9a6647dc8d2bcf9c2e164.tar.gz
==> Staging archive: /tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-fast-global-file-status-1.1-lq6iajneyqghcvnxtsezb6h2hkafmi2k/fastglobalfilestatus-1.1.tar.gz
==> Created stage in /tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-fast-global-file-status-1.1-lq6iajneyqghcvnxtsezb6h2hkafmi2k
==> No patches needed for fast-global-file-status
==> 28487: fast-global-file-status: Building fast-global-file-status [AutotoolsPackage]
==> 28487: fast-global-file-status: Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> 28487: fast-global-file-status: Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-fast-global-file-status-1.1-lq6iajneyqghcvnxtsezb6h2hkafmi2k/spack-src/configure' '--prefix=/home/ubuntu/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/fast-global-file-status-1.1-lq6iajneyqghcvnxtsezb6h2hkafmi2k' '--with-mpa=/home/ubuntu/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mount-point-attributes-1.1-jeuo34joaqgtoun37q33dsxitwg5tsln' '--with-mrnet=/home/ubuntu/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-haswell/gcc-8.4.0/mrnet-5.0.1-3-gyz6cpm6xkk7t7wk4ie3u25zknsqi2qa'

1 error found in build log:
     108    checking for mrnet/MRNet.h... yes
     109    checking Checking MRNet Version... 4.0
     110    checking for libmrnet... yes
     111    checking for mrnet_commnode... /home/ubuntu/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-hasw
            ell/gcc-8.4.0/mrnet-5.0.1-3-gyz6cpm6xkk7t7wk4ie3u25zknsqi2qa/bin/mrnet_commnode
     112    checking for mrnet_topgen... /home/ubuntu/spack/opt/spack/linux-ubuntu18.04-haswel
            l/gcc-8.4.0/mrnet-5.0.1-3-gyz6cpm6xkk7t7wk4ie3u25zknsqi2qa/bin/mrnet_topgen
     113    checking for libelf... checking for elf_begin in -lelf... no
  >> 114    configure: error: libelf is needed to build this package

See build log for details:
  /tmp/ubuntu/spack-stage/spack-stage-fast-global-file-status-1.1-lq6iajneyqghcvnxtsezb6h2hkafmi2k/spack-build-out.txt
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.14.2-705-eaccc5815
* **Python:** 3.6.9
* **Platform:** linux-ubuntu18.04-haswell

<!-- If you have any relevant configuration detail (custom `packages.yaml` or `modules.yaml`, etc.) you can add that here as well. -->

### Additional information

<!-- Please upload the following files. They should be present in the stage directory of the failing build. Also upload any config.log or similar file if one exists. -->
* [spack-build-out.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4498314/spack-build-out.txt)
* [spack-build-env.txt](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/4498315/spack-build-env.txt)

<!-- Some packages have maintainers who have volunteered to debug build failures. Run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mention them here if they exist. -->

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: fast-global-file-status
